item.title: Delete Your Account
item.description: To delete your account and associated information (phone number, email, username, password, full name, job, and age) in the Ligeet APP, please follow these steps:

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: Ligeet Ligeet is a mobile application for Pharmacies’ services. Table of Contents Terms & Conditions Copy Rights Service changes and updates device security Third parties Internet Connection and Fees Service availablity Terms of Use Basic Terms General Conditions Privacy Policy Information Collection and Use Log Data Cookies Service Providers Security Links to Other Sites Children’s Privacy Changes to This Policy Contact Us Terms & Conditions By downloading or using the app, these terms will automatically apply to you – you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app.

item.title: Change APP language
item.description: When starting Ligeet application for the first time, the APP will use your mobile language.

item.title: Search for Medicine
item.description: Once you successfully sing up a new account in Ligeet APP, you will be able to search for medicines in the near by pharmacies.

item.title: How to add your pharmacy in Ligeet APP
item.description: To add your pharmacy at Ligeet Application, Please fill the form in this link. In the application form, you will be asked to provide the pharmacy (only main branch) information.

item.title: Create New Account
item.description: In order to register in Ligeet APP, Please follow below steps: press on “create new account” in the bottom of the mobile APP screen.

item.title: Change Password in Ligeet APP
item.description: In case you forgot your Ligeet sign-in password, please follow the steps below to restore it.
